website_summaries.verdict: A 1,000 pound rated Olympic bar that works well for men and women.
pros: This 1,000 pound rated bar has medium knurl markings, making it a good choice for beginners
The bar spins freely and is zinc coated to prevent rust
cons: Some users complain that the knurling isn't aggressive enough

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Knurling is passive I have to chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it . Knurling is passive I have to chalk up, but my hands sweat easily. It's good for all the 3 main lifts. For deadlifts it has some flex/whip to it but nothing too crazy like the Texas deadlift bar. If you like using a stiff bar I think they're coming out with a 29mm stiff power bar. Still good to deadlift with pulled 410 with it like I mentioned flex is very little . If you want to do olympic lifts the recommend light weight with this due to the center knurl. They do offer a black oxide bar with no center knurl for I think 10 or 20 dollars more .
customer_reviews.author: raie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, this bar was worth it. Collars spin smoothly, Knurls(?) aren't too aggresive. I don't have 1000 lbs. so I can't test its rated limit, and I bought this for my wife who probably won't exceed 185 lbs. (weight on bar, not wife's weight). But its construction is similar to other bars I use, and those get abused with 300+ lb. power lifting/olympic movements.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Solid "Shorter" Bar
customer_reviews.text: Needed a shorter bar due to very limited space. It is a very solid bar. Clean, spins freely. It can hold loads of large plates & collars on each. Olympic size ends that are a just a little shorter. I can now change weight without putting holes in the wall or smashing my knuckles. FYI~ It does have a noticeable thinner diameter. I wasn't sure I would notice the thinner diameter but, yes it is noticeable. The thinner diameter is not to god or bad in my opinion, just noticeable. That was my trade-off for a much needed shorter bar.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schlott

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for home gym
customer_reviews.text: So far really liking this bar for my home gym. Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The knurling isn't aggressive enough at all for pulling heavy, but it spins pretty well, and holds plenty of weight without too much whip.
customer_reviews.author: TheCleansingTide

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: My first brand new Barbell. Excellent quality. I love it. Wish they open a shop in MN or I live in Colorado to avoid shipping charges.. Better to directly order from their website..
customer_reviews.author: sase

customer_reviews.title: I love this bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar! I love working out in my own little gym when I can't make it to my crossfit sessions. This bar is an awesome addition.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B. Odom, PhD

customer_reviews.title: He said it feels fine to work out with it and seems that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend. He loves it. He said it feels fine to work out with it and seems that it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: hit my concrete floor from 1-2 inches away and put a nice sharp dent in it
customer_reviews.text: Packaging protects the bar well, however, I wish the ends were protected in bubble wrap. When I finally got it open, it slid out, hit my concrete floor from 1-2 inches away and put a nice sharp dent in it. Barbell and all other products from Rep are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We set up a garage gym after working out at a CrossFit gym for the last ten years. This bar has already exceeded my expectations. We are extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence...
customer_reviews.text: Would order from them again....package came well wrapped to protect its content...delivered in a few days...all is well excellent product...happy to do business with them again while I build my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bar. Use in a training gym studio. Clients love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but aside from that it is great.
customer_reviews.text: It could have a more aggressive knurl as the bar gets slippery if your heads sweat, but aside from that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my bar. Would recommend this device to anyone heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good bar
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue where the wrong bar was sent - they promptly fixed the issue. Bar seems good - been lifting with it daily for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Drama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar for my squats, deadlifts, and bench. Its solid and doesnt fall apart like the dept store bar i had before.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Rep Sabre barbell
customer_reviews.text: This barbell exceeded my expectations as far as the price/value ratio. This bar is definitely worth it and I 100% recommend buying it if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: william wynn

customer_reviews.title: I love this bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar! Arrived in excellent condition and is exactly what is pictured. I love the 33lb weight bar.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A great bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great bar for the price! The knurling is a soft medium which is perfect for beginners to intermediate users. If you plan on doing basic workouts, this bar is good for you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived exposed and damaged! It wasn’t properly covered and when I received it was scratched and chipped!
customer_reviews.author: ARTOX05

customer_reviews.title: Nice knurling. One end did not spin as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the money. Nice knurling. One end did not spin as well as the other end. And even then, the good side was a bit 'sticky'. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: 2strongthumbs

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Its cheap,
customer_reviews.text: Barbell is smells like metal coins and was covered in oil. I bought I different bar from prx. And it doesn't smell and doesn't have oil covering it. I should've paid more for two of the other brand. There is also a vibration doing deadlifts that throws me off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell
customer_reviews.text: Best barbell I have owned to date. Worth the upgrade from entry level barbells.
customer_reviews.author: O. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Killer all around bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well I just pulled a 500lb deadlift for the first time with this thing. If you have any concerns about the quality of this bar just know it will handle whatever you throw at it unless your name is Hafthor Bjornsson. Knurling is not overall too aggressive, which could be a draw back for some. Definitely stacks up to the Rogue Echo bar which is in a similar price bracket, but still significantly more expensive than the REP Sabre.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Seres

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This bar is awesome it is a great deal for the price. The knurling is not too bad it is actually very good. It will not tear up your hands but it is good enough to have a good grip. I will definitely be looking for another bar from REP with knurling on the center for squats only.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this bar and it looked used. Wanted to share with Amazon community.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these bars and they get used a lot. This is an excellent value for a high quality bar. All of Rep's equipment is top notch and the folks there are great to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs in the high school weight room.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilson

product_meta.title: REP FITNESS Sabre Olympic Bar - 1000 lb Rated - Barbell for Cross-Training, Olympic and Power Lifting
feature_bullets: 20 kg (44 lb)1000 lb rated Olympic bar, 150k tensile, ideal for powerlifting movements such as squats, bench press, and deadlifts. Sleeves spin well, making it useful for Cross Training/HIIT workouts and weightlifting.
Dual knurl markings, medium depth knurl, with center knurl, which is great for gripping your back during squats.
Bushing for smooth sleeve rotation for weightlifting

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
